Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.auth.jwt

Class JwtOperations<SK extends Key,VK extends Key>

java.lang.Object
gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.auth.jwt.JwtOperations<SK,VK>
Type Parameters:
SK - The signing key
VK - The verfication key
public class JwtOperations<SK extends Key,VK extends Key> extends Object
Encapsulates the token generation (signing) and verification operations for Json Web Tokens.
